Title: Q044-Controlled Demolition and Making Good Works of 156 & 180 Bradshawgate Bolton BL2 1BA
Description: The Borough Council of Bolton ("the Authority") is prepared to receive tenders for The Controlled Demolition and Making Good Works of 156 & 180 Bradshawgate which will be subject to the information, specification and tender package enclosed. The existing buildings are detached, steel framed buildings within their own site perimeter located on Bradshawgate, Bolton adjacent to Trinity Street and Bolton Railway Station.

Title: 18-053 - RCP4 Framework
Description:
The establishment of a framework of pre-qualified organisations who have the ability to provide a variety of
construction works, principally involving minor building works, structural repairs, roofing, demolition, mechanical
and electrical installation and repair works, and fixed wire testing. This framework will be split into specific lots
based on the works description.
